name: Reflection (itch) (CodeShaper)
description:
There are monsters out there in the fog.  You can't see them, but they can see you...

You had better find a weapon, and fast.  Then gather some mirrors, that's the only way to see the monsters.  Use your time wisely to prepare, because once time runs out, and the monsters howl, they come for you whether you're ready or not.

Features 12 Unique Levels to unlock.

Controlls:

  • WASD-   Move
  • Mouse-   Look Around
  • R-   Reload Gun
  • Space-   Jump
  • R Click-   Fire Gun
  • L Click-   Pick up/Place Mirror
  • E-   Pick up Ammo/Gun
  • T-   Speed up time
